sentences.sContent: In retrospect, I was a sad little boy and a standard-issue, shiftless, egotistical, dejected teen-ager.
sentences.sContent_eng: In retrospect, I was a sad little boy and a standard-issue, shiftless, egotistical, dejected teen-ager.
sentences.sCn: 回顾往事，我曾是一个悲哀的小男孩，一个无能的、任性的、沮丧的标准问题少年。

synos.tran: 偷懒的；无计谋的；无能的

remMethod.val: 来自shift (移动) + less → 不移动的 → 偷懒的

trans.tranCn: 偷懒的；无计谋的；无能的
